<title level="1" right="Spell 4" pfs="Standard">
[Spike Stones](/Spells.aspx?ID=717)
<actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Earth" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=55" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 225 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Tradition**
[Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 60 feet

**Area** 20-foot burst

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 hour
</row>

</column>

---

Long, sharp spikes of solid rock thrust up from the ground in the area. The area becomes difficult terrain and hazardous terrain. A creature that moves on the ground through the area takes 3 piercing damage for every square of that area it moves into.

---
**Heightened (+1)** Increase the damage by 1.
name: Spike Stones
